p: The fresh stembarks of L. sericeus were sourced from a forest edge in Ikono Local Government Area of Akwa Ibom State, Nigeria and identified and authenticated by a botanist Mr. Ndukwe Ibe, from the Department of Forestry, Michael Okpara University of Agriculture, Umudike, Nigeria. The plant sample was further confirmed at the Pharmacognosy and Natural Medicine Department of the University of Uyo, Nigeria, where a voucher specimen (UUH 62/19) of the plant was deposited in the Herbarium
